snippet.title: He Is Coming Announcement Trailer | Fantasy Roguelite RPG
snippet.description:
A long-forgotten enemy rises and brings portents of doom – the Demon King is coming, and without a champion to strike him down, the world will surely fall to his corruption. Seek out powerful weapons and artifacts by day, stand against his minions by night, and prepare to be hunted by powerful entities from ages past in this roguelite role-playing game.

➤ Wishlist on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2824490/He_is_coming/

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse

Follow us on social media:
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/hoodedhorse
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoodedHorseInc
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/
https://www.youtube.com/HoodedHorse

Video Details:
He Is Coming Announcement Trailer | Fantasy Roguelite RPG

#heiscoming #roguelike #hoodedhorse 

Every three days a shadow looms.
Portents foretell of impending doom.
At night in darkness
the dangers grow bold.
Stirred into frenzy by powers of old.
Synergies.
Treasures.
Strategies abound.
Dangers and villains.
Sure to confound.
You must not grow weary.
As time will not wait.
For he is coming to determine your fate.
